review: I have a Chromecast so I was hesitant to buy another streaming stick. I'm glad I did because the Fire TV Stick is so much better. I no longer have to always have my phone available to play something. In addition, if you have a little bit of tech skills you can install almost any android APK on the Fire Stick, making it much more versatile.
author: Chris

review: Why pay for other online movie services when one Amazon Prime membership is all you need? The stick was all we needed to enjoy all our favorite movies and TV series shows.
author: DixieGirl
